e="preserve">Michael T. Osterholm (born March 10, 1953) is an American public health scientist. He is a biosecurity and infectious disease expert. He is the director of the Center for Infectious Disease Research and Policy (CIDRAP) at the University of Minnesota. Osterholm and Mark Olshaker wrote the book ' (2017). In March 2020, he appeared on "The Joe Rogan Experience" to talk about the COVID-19 pandemic.
Osterholm was born in Waukon, Iowa. He has two children.
